snippet.title: Please Touch The Artwork 2 - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Please, Touch The Artwork 2 is a relaxing hidden-object adventure. Explore iconic paintings, collect items for their quirky inhabitants, and solve casual puzzles. Discover the world of James Ensor, Belgian Modern Art pioneer. 

I'm a Belgian solodev working on games that let you interact with famous art in unique ways.

Please, touch the Wishlist button on Steam or mobile:
https://studiowaterzooi.com/links

Please, Touch The Artwork 2 will be available for free on Apple Appstore, Google Play and on Windows/Mac (Steam). No ads, no hidden fees, no paid DLC – just a free game to savor at your own pace. 

#PleaseTouchTheArtwork #Indiegame #IndieDev #JamesEnsor
